name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log.

alarms.description: Create an additional Switch service for each alarm.

excludeAirPlay.title: Exclude AirPlay 2
excludeAirPlay.description: Exclude AirPlay 2 zone players that are already exposed to Apple's Home app.  (Please Note: If your system is S2 only, enabling this option will remove all zones from Homebridge. Use with caution.)

filterFavourites.title: Filter Favorites
filterFavourites.description: Hide non-favorite audio inputs, (AirPlay, Line In etc.) from the favorites/TV Input list in Homekit.

heartrate.description: Interval (in seconds) to poll zone player.  Default: disabled.

leds.title: LEDs
leds.description: Create an additional Lightbulb service for the LED.  Also create an accessory for each slave zone player.

maxFavourites.description: Maximum number of favourites supported, between 16 and 96.  Default: 96.

port.description: Port to use for webserver receiving zone player notifications.  Default: random.

resetTimeout.description: Timeout (in milliseconds) to reset input.  Default: 500.

service.description: HomeKit service type for Sonos and Switch services.

speakers.description: Create an additional Speaker service for each zone.

subscriptionTimeout.description: Duration (in minutes) of subscriptions to ZonePlayer notifications.  Default: 30.

timeout.description: Timeout (in seconds) to wait for a response from a Sonos ZonePlayer.  Default: 15.

tv.title: TV
tv.description: Create an additional, non-bridged TV accessory for each zone.

tvIdPrefix.title: TV ID Prefix
tvIdPrefix.description: Prefix for serial number of TV accessories.  Default: 'TV'

tvEnabledZones.title: TV-Enabled Zones
tvEnabledZones.description: Specify which zones have a TV connected.

form.title: What
form.description: Select what to expose to HomeKit for each zone.

items.title: TV-Enabled Zones
items.description: Specify which zones have a TV connected.

form.title: How
form.description: Select how to expose a zone to HomeKit.

form.title: Advanced Settings
form.description: Don't change these, unless you understand what you're doing.
